products.name: IF Electrolytes
products.short_description: To be taken in the morning, on an empty stomach with a glass of water. Fresh start your day

products.name: IF Mineral Mix
products.short_description: Take two capsules with a glass of water and with your first meal of the day. For a full refeed.

products.name: IF Omega-3
products.short_description: Take one gel capsule with a glass of water and with your first meal of the day. The power of fat.

products.name: IF Magnesium
products.short_description: Take two capsules with a glass of water approximately 45 minutes before bedtime. Alkaline yourself.
